name: Stack
desc: A widget that positions its children relative to the edges of its box.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: How to align the non-positioned and partially-positioned children in the stack.

fields.name: textDirection
fields.desc: The text direction with which to resolve [alignment].

fields.name: fit
fields.desc: How to size the non-positioned children in the stack.

nodes.name: Combined Usage of Stack and Positioned
desc: The Positioned component can only be used within a Stack, allowing precise placement of a component by specifying distances from the top, left, right, and bottom.
